description: This file defines the JwtAuthFilter class, a Spring Security filter component that intercepts HTTP requests to validate JWT tokens in the Authorization header. It extracts the token, verifies it via JwtService, retrieves user details, and sets the security context accordingly.

classes.name: JwtAuthFilter
classes.description: A Spring Security filter component that authenticates requests based on JWT tokens in the Authorization header.

methods.name: doFilterInternal
methods.description: Overrides the method to process incoming requests, extract and validate JWT tokens, and set the security context.
